title: I mistakely charged 100 dollars in my acc
body: Hi, I mistakely topped up 100 bucks on my oce league acc. I meant to top up 10 bucks but i put one more 0 on 10. Is there any chance to make it back to my acc? plz I really need it to back. I would like some any comment on this

replies.body:
Where exactly did you _"top up"_? 

At no point when buying RP through the official OCE online store are you able to type "$10", or "$100" of RP. Instead you click buttons like [these](https://i.gyazo.com/e4d0c335e878694b1b366288a528370b.png) to buy the amount of RP you want. Are you sure you purchased that RP from Riot and not somewhere else?

Either way, it's probably a good idea to contact Riot Support [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and explain your case to them. Use the category _"I have a question about purchasing RP"_.

Good luck! :)
